My primary role is to act as an internal advocate for customers, ensuring they have a voice in shaping the future of Nextiva. I bring sincerity and a passion for driving customer success through industry best practices and advocating for the hosted unified communications sector as an enterprise game-changer. I also work closely with all internal departments to ensure we understand customer requirements and respond with appropriate quality of service – throughout  the lifecycle of our relationship.

Forward-thinking organizations rely on Nextiva Business Cloud Communication to decrease capital expenses while increasing employee engagement - all made possible through our award-winning NextOS unified cloud communication platform. Reach out and talk to us, we'll show you what's possible.

recommendations: Rob Lawson
Field Sales Engineer III at Sage Software
June 14, 2010, David worked with Rob in the same group

I worked with David for nearly 3 years while he was on the Sage Sales Team.  I have recently worked with him in his new sales position.  He has been one of the most professional and honest sales people I have ever worked with.  Over the three years of working with David on the SageCRM.com Sales Team and then when we moved over to the SageCRM Sales Team he has been professional with all of his dealings between customers, partners and staff.  I would consider him a great resource and a great catch for any organization.

Bill Hoffman
Listen, Learn and share your experiences every day.
August 13, 2008, David reported directly to Bill

Bill is a passionate, dedicated and bright individual....his winning attitude and high energy are an inspiration in the workplace and a driving force behind his ability to lead.  As a CRM sales representative, I worked for Bill and benefited greatly under his tutelage.  His belief in CRM and overall knowledge of the CRM industry are invaluable assets, and I would welcome the opportunity to learn from him again in the future.
